/*   Anurag Anand  */

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int num;
    scanf("%d",&num);
    int count=0;
    while(num)
    {
              if(num%2) count++;
              num/=2;
    }
    printf("%d\n",count);
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
